entry.name: invalid_business_id
entry.text: Invalid business ID %s.
entry.description: Cannot find a partner profile with the indicated business ID.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that a business ID is associated with a particular partner profile.

entry.name: missing_required_header
entry.text: Missing required header %s.
entry.description: Missing the indicated header.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the following required headers are presented: AS2-From (if AS2), AS3-From (if AS3), AS2-To (if AS2), AS3-To (if AS3), Message-Id, Date, and Content-Type.

entry.name: parsing_as_header_error
entry.text: Incorrect %1$s format of %2$s.
entry.description: Error occurred while parsing AS headers. The probable causes are that the format is not correct or that an attribute is invalid.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the value of headers follow the requirements in RFC 4130 and RFC 4823.

entry.name: unsupported_as_version
entry.text: Unsupported AS version %s
entry.description: Received an unsupported AS version in an inbound scenario.
entry.suggestion: The currently supported versions are 1.0 through 1.9.

entry.name: unexpected_mdn_response
entry.text: Unexpected MDN response. The original message ID was %s.
entry.description: Received an MDN that contained an unexpected message ID.
entry.suggestion: Check the message ID in the MDN response.

entry.name: gateway_db_operation_failed
entry.text: Gateway persistence store operation failed
entry.description: Persistence store operation failed. Some information might be missing.

entry.name: rtx_exhausted
entry.text: Message retransmission exhausted for transaction ID %s.
entry.description: The maximum number of resend attempts was reached. Retransmission stopped.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the destination URL is correct. Contact this partner and ask whether they received the message.

entry.name: rtx_prepare_context_error
entry.text: Failed to prepare context for retransmission for transaction ID %s.
entry.description: Failed to prepare the context for retransmission of the indicated transaction.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the metadata for this transaction is stored in the database and that the archived message still exist.

entry.name: rtx_general_error
entry.text: Failed to retransmit the message for transaction ID %s.
entry.description: Failed to retransmit the message for the indicated transaction.

entry.name: unsupported_document_type
entry.text: Target document type %s is not enabled by partner
entry.description: The configuration for the partner does not support the indicated document type. The available document types are XML, EDI ANSI X12, EDIFACT, and Binary. You enable supported document types while configuring the destination or CPA sender settings for a partner profile.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the partner profile, and ensure that it defines support for this document type.

entry.name: config_no_as2_fsph
entry.text: No AS2 handler associated with the gateway.
entry.description: The gateway has no associated AS2 handler.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the gateway, and ensure that it defines at least one AS2 handler.

entry.name: config_no_as3_fsph
entry.text: No AS3 handler associated with the gateway.
entry.description: The gateway has no associated AS3 handler.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the gateway, and ensure that it defines at least one AS3 handler.

entry.name: reject_duplicate_message
entry.text: Rejected a duplicate message. Transaction %1$s has the same message ID (%2$s).
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the value of the "Message-ID" header to ensure that it is unique.

entry.name: mdn_url_setting_error
entry.text: Error setting MDN URL for partner ID %s.
entry.description: When preparing the "Receipt-Delivery-Option" header in the outbound scenario, the B2B gateway could not retrieve the MDN URL.
entry.suggestion: Check the destination in the configuration of the partner profile, and ensure that the MDN URL was set. If not, ensure that the default MDN URL was set at gateway level. If not, ensure that the gateway defines at least one AS2 or AS3 handler for the dynamic construction of the MDN URL.

entry.name: start_recovery_deferred
entry.text: Deferring retransmission recovery
entry.description: The retransmission recovery process is being deferred. This process is responsible for initiating retransmission. The reason for deferral might be that the persistence store is not initialized.
entry.suggestion: Check whether the retransmission recovery process begins after the persistence store is initialized.

entry.name: start_recovery
entry.text: Beginning retransmission recovery
entry.description: The retransmission recovery process is being started. This process is responsible for initiating retransmission.

entry.name: config_redirect_not_permitted
entry.text: MDN redirection for destination %s is not allowed.
entry.description: Redirect is not permitted for the indicated destination.
entry.suggestion: Check the value of the "Redirect AS MDN" setting in for the destination property of the partner profile configuration.

entry.name: setup_async_connection
entry.text: Set up asynchronous connection against URL %s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: async_connection_failed
entry.text: Set up asynchronous connection failed
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the system logs for additional details.

entry.name: mdn_requirement
entry.text: MDN request for inbound message: Required (%1$s), Asynchronous (%2$s)
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: transaction_id
entry.text: New B2B transaction (%s) created
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: mdn_received
entry.text: Received MDN for Message-ID %s
entry.description: Messages sent via AS2 and AS3 can request acknowledgments. The DataPower Gateway received an MDN for a message that it generated.

entry.name: missing_original_messageid
entry.text: Received an MDN that does not contain the original message ID
entry.description: Received an MDN that does not contain the original message ID
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the MDN contains a corresponding message ID.

entry.name: backend_url
entry.text: Sending message to URL %s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: inbound_response_messageid
entry.text: Generated Message-ID %s for MDN
entry.description: Messages received via AS2 and AS3 can request acknowledgments. These acknowledgments are sent as separate messages and have AS2 or AS3 Message-ID headers that are distinct from the received message.

entry.name: outbound_message_info
entry.text: Sending outbound message from partner %1$s to partner %2$s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: outbound_request_messageid
entry.text: New message ID %s for outbound request
entry.description: New message ID for outbound request. Skip the host name.

entry.name: rtx_schedule_task
entry.text: Schedule new retransmit task for transaction %s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: rtx_schedule_task_detail
entry.text: Schedule new retransmit task for transaction %1$s from partner %2$s to partner %3$s against URL %4$s with interval %5$d
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: rtx_remove_task
entry.text: Removed retransmit task for transaction %1$s, message ID %2$s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: rtx_retransmit_task
entry.text: Starting retransmission to URL %1$s for transaction %2$s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: inbound_bad_ctype
entry.text: Cannot process the content type header to determine message security, content type %s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: inbound_data_not_encrypted
entry.text: Inbound data is not encrypted but the partner profile requires encrypted incoming messages
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: missing_disposition
entry.text: No disposition can be found in received MDN.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: In the outbound scenario, check if the trading partner includes a disposition result in the MDN.

entry.name: could_not_verify_mdn_signature
entry.text: Cannot verify MDN signature
entry.description: The received MDN was not signed or had an invalid signature.

entry.name: archive_start_by_age
entry.text: Auto archive task started.
entry.description: Start operation to archive all the documents older than configured age if both thresholds of archive minimum size and archive minimum documents reached.

entry.name: archive_start_by_size
entry.text: Maximum document-disk-used space reached, starting archive task.
entry.description: Archive processed documents to free disk space.

entry.name: archive_measure_diskspace
entry.text: Calculate used disk space
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: archive_purge_record
entry.text: Purge processed document with ID %s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: archive_db_operation_failed
entry.text: Failed to select transactions to archive/purge from persistence store
entry.description: Error occurred when attempting to select transactions to archive or purge from the persistence store. No documents archived or purged.

entry.name: archive_records_found
entry.text: Found %1$zd processed documents with total size of %2$zd KB. Required %3$d documents or total size of %4$d KB.
entry.description: The number of processed documents and their size compared to conditions for archive start.

entry.name: archive_target_connection_failed
entry.text: Cannot connect to archive target %s.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: archive_target_write_failed
entry.text: Cannot write to archive target. Archive filename: %s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: archive_done
entry.text: Archive operation complete. %d KB freed.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: archive_diskspace
entry.text: Disk space used by gateway is %d KB.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: as3_headers_missing
entry.text: Mandatory AS3 headers are missing: %s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: inbound_message_id
entry.text: Received message with Message-ID %s
entry.description: Each message received via AS2 or AS3 includes a unique Message-ID.

entry.name: rtx_b2bgw_missing
entry.text: Cannot locate the original B2B gateway for retransmission with XML manager %s.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the B2B gateway.

entry.name: no_decryption_idcred
entry.text: No identification credential to decrypt incoming message to partner %s
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration for the partner profile, and ensure that the identification credential for decryption is in the "up" state.

entry.name: looking_for_document_type
entry.text: Looking for document type
entry.description: B2B gateway is attempting to determine the document type.

entry.name: autodetecting_document_type
entry.text: Detecting document type
entry.description: The document does not specify a document type. The B2B gateway is attempting to determine the document type.

entry.name: executing_AAA
entry.text: Running AAA policy
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: processing_content
entry.text: Received document is not an MDN. Processing content.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: document_type_is
entry.text: Document type is %s
entry.description: The B2B gateway determined the document type.

entry.name: config_duplicate_business_id
entry.text: Partner profiles %1$s and %2$s have the same business ID (%3$s).
entry.description: The ID for each partner profile must be unique.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the each business ID and any forced AS header ID for each partner profile is unique. A partner profile can contain more than one business ID.

entry.name: cannot_sign_mdn
entry.text: Failed to sign MDN from business ID %s
entry.description: An AS sender requested a signed MDN, but the DataPower Gateway could not generate the signature. The profile for the internal partner with the specified business ID did not contain an identification credential for signing.
entry.suggestion: Configure and assign an identification credentials to the appropriate internal partner profile.

entry.name: invalid_doc_storage_location
entry.text: Document storage location %s is invalid.
entry.description: Each B2B gateway can have a separate location for storing copies of documents associated with external partners. The URL in the configuration does not correspond to a valid storage location.
entry.suggestion: Change the URL for the document storage location to a valid location. As a last resort, set the URL to "(default)" to use the encrypted partition of the RAID for document storage.

entry.name: config_no_as3_ftp_auth_info
entry.text: No FTP authentication information provided for destination %s.
entry.description: For the indicated destination, the user name and password for FTP authentication are invalid or were not provided.
entry.suggestion: If defining the destination URL explicitly, ensure that the user name and password are provided and are valid. If using a configured destination, ensure that the user name and password properties are defined and are valid.

entry.name: config_as3_ftp_auth_info_conflict
entry.text: FTP authentication conflict in destination %s.
entry.description: The FTP user name and password in the explicit destination URL and in the user name and password configuration properties are not the same.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the destination, and ensure that the user name and password in the explicit destination URL and in the user name and password configuration properties are the same.

entry.name: outbound_cms_operation_failed
entry.text: Cannot perform the operation on outbound message %s
entry.description: Cannot perform the requested encrypt, sign, or compress operation on the message.

entry.name: outbound_cms_operation_succeeded
entry.text: Operation on outbound message is successful.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: inbound_cms_operation_failed
entry.text: Cannot perform the operation on inbound message %s
entry.description: Cannot perform the decrypt or uncompress operation on the message.

entry.name: inbound_cms_operation_succeeded
entry.text: Operations on inbound message succeeded.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: mdn_mic_mismatch
entry.text: Received MDN MIC %1$s does not match outbound message MIC %2$s.
entry.description: The MIC in the received MDN does not match the MIC for the outbound message.

entry.name: config_no_internal_profile
entry.text: No internal partner profile associated with B2B gateway %s.
entry.description: A B2B gateway should have at least two partner profiles: one internal and one external.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the B2B gateway, and ensure that it defines at least one internal partner profile.

entry.name: config_no_external_profile
entry.text: No external partner profile associated with B2B gateway %s.
entry.description: A B2B gateway should have at least two partner profiles: one internal and one external.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the B2B gateway, and ensure that it defines at least one external partner profile.

entry.name: rtx_db_operation_failed
entry.text: Retransmit persistence store operation failed
entry.description: The retransmit operation for the persistence store failed. Some information might be missing.

entry.name: no_transaction_id
entry.text: No B2B transaction ID
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: gateway_max_disk_space
entry.text: Maximum allowed disk space for gateway is reached
entry.description: The B2B gateway is configured to use no more than a set amount of disk space. This threshold was reached, and the gateway will be disabled if free storage size is fairly low.
entry.suggestion: Increase the maximum allowable disk space for gateway.

entry.name: message_id_too_long
entry.text: Received Message-ID exceeds maximum acceptable length of %zd
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: as_name_too_long
entry.text: Received AS-Name exceeds maximum acceptable length of %zd
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: archive_measure_dbspace
entry.text: Calculate space used by persistent store.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: archive_dbspace
entry.text: Disk space used by persistent store is %d KB.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: archive_max_dbspace
entry.text: Disk space used by persistent store is close to maximum
entry.description: The disk space used by the persistence store is close to the maximum threshold. An archive/purge operation might be triggered for this B2B gateway.
entry.suggestion: Increase the storage size for B2B persistence.

entry.name: archive_now_already_running
entry.text: Archive operation for gateway %s is already running.
entry.description: A forced archive operation for this gateway is in progress. Subsequent manual archive requests are ignored.

entry.name: archive_now_start
entry.text: Archive all documents operation started
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: archive_now_enqueue_command
entry.text: Automated archive operation running. Will queue manual archive request.
entry.description: An archive operation based on disk usage or time is already running. The manual archive request will wait for the active archive operation to finish.

entry.name: archive_now_running_queued_command
entry.text: Enqueued archive operation starting
entry.description: Starting a manual archive request. This archive operation was requested while an automated archive operation was running.

entry.name: archive_operation_completed
entry.text: Archive operation completed
entry.description: The manual or automated archive operation completed.

entry.name: gateway_has_misconfigured_archive
entry.text: Gateway %s does not have a properly configured archive
entry.description: Cannot run the archive operation, because the gateway is not configured correctly.
entry.suggestion: Check the gateway status to determine which setting are not configured correctly.

entry.name: inbound_data_not_signed
entry.text: Inbound data is not signed, but the partner profile requires signed incoming messages
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: dest_has_no_async_mdn_url
entry.text: External partner %1$s (destination %2$s) has no asynchronous %3$s MDN URL
entry.description: Destinations for an external partner that request an asynchronous MDN must have an MDN URL for that protocol.
entry.suggestion: Set the URL for the asynchronous MDN. The URL can be set either for the destination of the external partner or for the gateway.

entry.name: doc_storage_cannot_be_local
entry.text: Document storage location cannot be local:///.
entry.description: The storage location for B2B documents cannot be the "local:" directory. The DataPower Gateway contains limited space for files and other artifacts.
entry.suggestion: Change the URL for document storage to a valid location. You can store documents on the encrypted partition of the RAID (default); on the unencrypted partition of the RAID (local:///ondisk); or on a remote mount point, such as an iSCSI or NFS mount, that is configured under the "local:" directory.

entry.name: could_not_extract_from_id
entry.text: Cannot extract ID of sending partner
entry.description: The ID of the sending partner could not be extracted from the incoming message.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the message is well formed. For XML messages, ensure that the XPath routing policy is correct. For binary messages, ensure that the routing style sheet is correct.

entry.name: could_not_extract_to_id
entry.text: Cannot extract ID of receiving partner
entry.description: The ID of the receiving partner could not be extracted from the incoming message.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the message is well formed. For XML messages, ensure that the XPath routing policy is correct. For binary messages, ensure that the routing style sheet is correct.

entry.name: config_duplicate_email_address
entry.text: Partner profiles %1$s and %2$s have the same email address (%3$s).
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the email addresses for each partner profile are unique.

entry.name: missing_business_id
entry.text: Missing or empty business ID.
entry.description: The business ID is missing or could not be extracted from the incoming message.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the message is well formed.

entry.name: as1_using_subject_header_contents
entry.text: The B2B gateway is using 'Subject' header contents for routing AS1 message to trading partner. 'Subject' header = %s
entry.description: The B2B gateway is using the contents of the 'Subject' header to route AS1 messages to trading partner, if a semicolon separates the business ID of each trading partner in the header. Using the contents of the 'Subject' header, if available, take precedence over using the contents of the 'To' and 'From' headers.

entry.name: rtx_smtp_conn_missing
entry.text: Cannot use the SMTP server connection %s to resend the email message. Using the default connection.
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway attempts to use the original SMTP configuration to retransmit AS1 and email messages. If the original configuration is unavailable, the DataPower Gateway uses the default connection.
entry.suggestion: Edit the SMTP server connection, or create and assign a new SMTP server connection.

entry.name: rtx_default_smtp_conn_missing
entry.text: The default SMTP server connection is missing or not defined correctly. Cannot resend email message.
entry.description: Unable to retransmit AS1 or email message due to missing or incorrectly configured SMTP server connection.
entry.suggestion: Edit the SMTP server connection, or create and assign a new SMTP server connection.

entry.name: no_email_address_for_sending_partner
entry.text: No email address defined for sending partner %s
entry.description: The system cannot send the email, because it cannot determine the "From" address.
entry.suggestion: Add an email address to the partner.

entry.name: no_email_address_for_receiving_partner
entry.text: No email address defined for receiving partner %s
entry.description: The system cannot send the email, because it cannot determine the "To" address.
entry.suggestion: Add an email address to the destination for the partner.

entry.name: as1_mdn_smtp_server_conn_not_enabled
entry.text: The SMTP server connection %s for AS1 MDN responses is not enabled or configured
entry.description: Cannot send AS1 MDN response, because the SMTP server connection for AS1 MDN responses is not enabled or configured.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the SMTP server connection that the B2B gateway uses for MDN, and ensure that its operation state is "up". If there is B2B gateway defines no SMTP server connection, create an SMTP server connection.

entry.name: cannot_get_from_address_for_mdn_response
entry.text: Cannot find 'From' address for MDN response
entry.description: Cannot find the 'From' address for the MDN response. The system is using the default value of 'admin@localhost.com'. If the system cannot find the 'To' address of the incoming message, it will attempt to use the default email address of the receiving partner.
entry.suggestion: Add a default email address to the configuration of the receiving partner.

entry.name: config_internal_dest_is_as1_as2_as3
entry.text: Internal partner %1$s has destination %2$s using AS1, AS2, or AS3 URL protocol.
entry.description: The URL for the destination is set to use the AS1, AS2, or AS3 protocol. The DataPower Gateway treats an AS1 destination as using the SMTP protocol, an AS2 destination as using an HTTP protocol, and an AS3 destination as using an FTP protocol. The DataPower Gateway will use these protocols to replace AS1, AS2 or AS3 properties for MDN, retransmission, or AS security features.
entry.suggestion: Change the URL protocol for the destination to use 'dpsmtp' for AS1, to use 'http' for AS2, or 'ftp' for AS3.

entry.name: config_smtp_server_conn_object_down
entry.text: The SMTP server connection %1$s for partner %2$s destination %3$s is not enabled.
entry.description: The SMTP server connection for the "as1" or "dpsmtp" destination is not enabled. Cannot send the AS1 MDN response.
entry.suggestion: Set the administrative state of the SMTP server connection to enabled.

entry.name: max_rtx_header_length_exceeded
entry.text: Reached the limit of 10000 bytes for header length when retransmitting. Headers truncated.
entry.description: A message was received with more than 10000 bytes in headers. The headers was truncated when retransmitting.
entry.suggestion: Reduce the size of the headers for incoming messages.

entry.name: ignoring_pos_mdn
entry.text: Ignoring positive MDN for message %s, because a positive MDN was already received.
entry.description: A positive MDN was received for a message that was already acknowledged with a previous positive MDN. Ignoring this MDN.

entry.name: ignoring_neg_mdn
entry.text: Ignoring negative MDN for message %s, because a positive MDN was already received.
entry.description: An MDN with a negative disposition was received for a message that was already acknowledged with a previous positive MDN. Ignoring this MDN.

entry.name: ignoring_failed_mdn
entry.text: Ignoring MDN processing error for message %s, because a positive MDN was already received.
entry.description: A failure occurred when processing an incoming MDN. The most likely cause is an MIC mismatch. However, the original message was already acknowledged with a positive MDN. Ignoring this MDN.

entry.name: ignoring_neg_failed_mdn
entry.text: Ignoring negative or MDN processing error for message %s, because negative MDN was already received.
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway received an MDN with a negative disposition or could not process the MDN. The most likely probably cause is an MIC mismatch. However, the original message was already acknowledged with a negative MDN or failure. Ignoring this MDN.

entry.name: updating_neg_mdn
entry.text: Postive MDN received for message %s. The message previously received a negative MDN or MDN processing error. Updating MDN status.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: rtx_manual_retransmit
entry.text: Attempting manual retransmit of transaction %s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: config_no_destination_url
entry.text: No destination URL for partner %1$s destination %2$s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: content_type_mismatch
entry.text: Envelope type '%1$s' does not match doc-type '%2$s' specified by headers
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: aaa_error_message
entry.text: Inbound B2B message failed AAA policy %1$s in handler: %2$s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: edi_error_message
entry.text: An error occurred when extracting partner info from %1$s message %2$s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: edi_parse_error_message
entry.text: An error occurred when parsing content of %1$s message (Content-Type: %2$s) : %3$s
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: no_xpath_policies_match_input
entry.text: No XPath policies match input.
entry.description: The XPath policy for the gateway does not match the incoming XML document. The gateway cannot determine the partner or message information.

entry.name: rejecting_duplicate_message
entry.text: Rejecting a duplicate message. Transaction %1$s has the same message ID (%2$s).
entry.description: The gateway rejected a duplicate message. The gateway will continue processing the message to generate a valid MIC.
entry.suggestion: Check the value of the "Message-ID" header to ensure that it is unique.

entry.name: config_internal_dest_is_ebms
entry.text: Internal partner %1$s has destination %2$s using ebMS URL protocol.
entry.description: The URL of the internal destination is configured to use the ebMS protocol. The DataPower Gateway treats the destination as using an HTTP protocol. The DataPower Gateway will use an HTTP protocol to replace ebMS properties such as acknowledgments, reliable messaging, or ebMS security features.
entry.suggestion: Change the URL protocol for the destination to use "http" or "https".

entry.name: ebms_acknowledged_pos
entry.text: Outbound message is acknowledged by positive Acknowledgment
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway received an Acknowledgment for an outbound ebMS message that it generated.

entry.name: ebms_no_ackurl
entry.text: Asynchronous response requested, but Acknowledgment URL is not set.
entry.description: When receiving a request ("Message", "Ping", "StatusRequest") that asks for an asynchronous reply, the URL to respond can be determined by the Acknowledgment URL for the external partner. However, the Acknowledgment URL for the external partner is not configured correctly.
entry.suggestion: Check the value for Acknowledgment URL in the ebMS settings.

entry.name: ebms_unexpected_response
entry.text: Unexpected ebMS Acknowledgment/Error message. Expect ID '%1$s', but received message refers to ID '%2$s'.
entry.description: Received a response that contains an unexpected "RefToMessageId".
entry.suggestion: Check the message that was received and sent.

entry.name: ebms_unexpected_async_response
entry.text: Received unexpected asynchronous ebMS response of type '%1$s'. Cannot find the referenced message '%2$s'.
entry.description: Received a response that contains an unexpected "RefToMessageId".
entry.suggestion: Check the message that was received and sent.

entry.name: ebms_no_errorurl
entry.text: Attempting to report asynchronous error message, but Error URL is not available.
entry.description: When sending an error message asynchronously, the URL is determined by the Error URL for the external partner. However, the Error URL for the external partner is not configured.
entry.suggestion: Check the value for Error URL in the ebMS settings.

entry.name: config_signedack_requested_without_valcred
entry.text: Signed %1$s requested in Destination %2$s, but partner profile %3$s has no inbound signature validation credential.
entry.description: The destination requests for signed acknowledgment, but the associated external partner profile does not have signature validation credential.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the signature validation credential for the inbound partner.

entry.name: ebms_statusresp_sent
entry.text: StatusResponse message replied to request sender
entry.description: The status response was sent to the status requester.

entry.name: matched_business_id
entry.text: Matched from external partner '%1$s' business ID '%2$s' to internal partner '%3$s' business ID '%4$s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_status_querying
entry.text: Querying message status
entry.description: A status request was received, and the query for the ebMS message identified by the "RefToMessageID" element is being processed. The status of the message will be replied to the request sender by a "StatusResponse" message.

entry.name: ebms_status_query_result
entry.text: Query result of status for message %1$s: %2$s
entry.description: Descriptions of the query result: "UnAuthorized" - The "StatusRequest" message is not authorized or accepted. For example, the "From" or "To" "PartyID" in the "StatusRequest" message does not match the original "From" or "To" "PartyID" in the ebMS message being queried. "NotRecognized" - The "StatusRequest" message is querying a message that is identified by the "RefToMessageId" element, but no message can be retrieved using the "RefToMessageId" element. The input for the "RefToMessageId" element in the "StatusRequest" Message might be wrong. "Received" - The ebMS message being queried was received. However, an error occurred when the message was being processed. For example, the message cannot be delivered to the destination. "Processed" - The ebMS message being queried was received, processed, and routed to the destination. Partners who request status for ebMS messages should not use the service for "StatusRequest" messages to implement reliable messaging.

entry.name: ebms_invalid_timestamp
entry.text: Incoming ebMS message has an invalid timestamp
entry.description: The received ebMS "StatusRequest" message contains a future timestamp. The DataPower Gateway shows this warning in this case and processes the message.

entry.name: ebms_timetolive_expired
entry.text: Report for an expired time-to-live error for message ID '%s'.
entry.description: The "TimeToLive" element of an incoming ebMS message has expired.
entry.suggestion: The DataPower Gateway rejected this message as a failed transaction.

entry.name: invalid_destination
entry.text: Invalid destination '%s'.
entry.description: Cannot find a destination with the indicated destination name.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the destination exists. For inbound transactions, check the destinations for internal partners. For external transactions, check the destinations for external partners.

entry.name: ebms_processing_error
entry.text: ebMS message processing error: %s
entry.description: General ebMS processing error. See message text.

entry.name: ebms_pong_processing_error
entry.text: Failed to parse ebMS Pong response for message ID '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_status_response_processing_error
entry.text: Failed to parse the response for an ebMS status request for message ID '%s'
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_duplicate_message_detected
entry.text: Detected duplicate message. Transaction '%1$s' contains the same message ID (%2$s) as a previously received message
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_eliminating_duplicate_message
entry.text: Eliminating duplicate ebMS message (%s)
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the value of the "MessageID" to ensure that it is unique.

entry.name: ebms_pong_sent
entry.text: Pong message sent to ping sender
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: rtx_statusrequest_task_start
entry.text: Sending a status request for message '%s'.
entry.description: Sending an ebMS2 request to the receiving partner to query the message status.

entry.name: rtx_statusrequest_task_done
entry.text: The status request for message '%1$s' is complete (%2$s).
entry.description: Received an ebMS2 status response for the previous request.

entry.name: rtx_statusrequest_task_err
entry.text: Error found when sending the status request for message '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the system logs for additional details.

entry.name: rtx_ping_task_start
entry.text: Sending a Ping message to URL '%s'.
entry.description: Sending an ebMS2 Ping message to the partner to see if it is operating.

entry.name: rtx_ping_task_done
entry.text: The result of ping request to URL %1$s is '%2$s'.
entry.description: Received an ebMS2 pong message for the previous ping request.

entry.name: rtx_ping_task_err
entry.text: Error found when sending the ping message to URL '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the system logs for additional details.

entry.name: ebms_ignoring_subsequent_ack
entry.text: Ignoring current ACK message for message %s. Already received an ACK message.
entry.description: On receipt of an end-to-end Acknowledgment message, subsequent Acknowledgment messages with the same "RefToMessageId" value are ignored. The original message was already acknowledged. Ignoring this ACK message without updating the transaction status.

entry.name: ebms_ignoring_subsequent_negack
entry.text: No update for referenced message %s. Already received an ACK or Error message.
entry.description: The B2B Gateway received an Error message that was acknowledged by an ACK message or notified by an Error message. The status is not updated.

entry.name: ebms_updating_negack
entry.text: Positive ACK message received for message %s that previously received an error message or previous replied with a processing error. Updating acknowledgment status.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_ignoring_ackfailures
entry.text: No update for message %s for failing to process an acknowledgment or error message.
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway is receiving an acknowledgment or error message. The status will not be updated when getting failure on processing the message.

entry.name: ebms_resend_ack_sync
entry.text: First response acknowledge message introduced to be resent synchronously.
entry.description: For a duplicate message, the acknowledgment message, which is identical to the first response message sent to the sender, will be replied to once more. This behavior is part of the ebMS reliability messaging service.

entry.name: ebms_resend_ack_async
entry.text: First response acknowledge message introduced to be resent asynchronously.
entry.description: For a duplicate message, the acknowledgment message, which is identical to the first response message sent to the sender, will be replied to once more. This behavior is part of the ebMS reliability messaging service.

entry.name: ebms_ebxml_validation_failure
entry.text: Validation failure: %s.
entry.description: The incoming message is not well formed or not a valid ebXML message. The ebXML validation process rejected the message.
entry.suggestion: Review the cause of the failure, and fix the error.

entry.name: ebms_no_replyurl
entry.text: Attempting to report asynchronous response, but the reporting URL is not available.
entry.description: When sending an asynchronous "Ack", "MessageError", "Pong", or "StatusResponse" message, the URL is determined by the Acknowledgment/Error URL for the external partner. The configuration does not define this URL correctly.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration for the Acknowledgment/Error URL in the ebMS settings.

entry.name: ebms_ack_not_signed
entry.text: The received ACK is not signed
entry.description: The received ACK is not signed, but the original message requested a signed ACK.

entry.name: ebms_ack_digest_not_match
entry.text: Digest does not match the original message
entry.description: The incoming ACK message is signed, but the digest of the ACK message does not match the digest of the original message.

entry.name: ebms_generating_ack
entry.text: Generating an acknowledgment in response of message ID '%s'.
entry.description: The received ebXML message with an "AckRequested" element was sent to the remote application. The DataPower Gateway is generating the acknowledgment message in response.

entry.name: ebms_generating_messageerror
entry.text: Generating a MessageError in report of error for message ID '%s'.
entry.description: An error occurred when the received ebXML Message was processed. A "MessageError" message was generated to report the error ("ErrorCode", "ErrorDescription") to the sending partner. This message indicates that an error occurs when processing a transaction.

entry.name: ebms_generating_pong
entry.text: Generating a pong response
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_generating_statusresponse
entry.text: Generating a message status response for message %s being queried
entry.description: Generating a message status response that returns the status of the message being queried.

entry.name: ebms_sending_ack_sync
entry.text: Transferring synchronous acknowledgment in response of message ID %s
entry.description: Responding with an acknowledgment message to the sending trading partner after the transaction was processed. If a "SyncReply" element is present, the acknowledgment is returned immediately in the same HTTP connection; otherwise, the acknowledgment message is delivered in an asynchronous connection to the address specified by the acknowledgment URL.

entry.name: ebms_sending_error_sync
entry.text: Transferring synchronous message error in report of error for message ID %s
entry.description: Reporting a negative acknowledgment to the sending trading partner, because an error occurred when processing the message or because the message was not delivered to the remote application. If a "SyncReply" element is present, the error message is returned immediately in the same HTTP connection; otherwise, the error message is delivered in an asynchronous connection to the address specified by the error URL.

entry.name: ebms_sending_ack_async
entry.text: Sending asynchronous acknowledgment in response to message ID %s
entry.description: Responding with an acknowledgment message to the sending trading partner after the transaction was processed. If a "SyncReply" element is present, the acknowledgment is returned immediately in the same HTTP connection; otherwise, the acknowledgment message is delivered in an asynchronous connection to the address specified by the acknowledgment URL.

entry.name: ebms_sending_error_async
entry.text: Sending asynchronous message error in report of error for message ID %s
entry.description: Reporting a negative acknowledgment to the sending trading partner, because an error occurred when processing the message or because the message was not delivered to the remote application. If a "SyncReply" element is present, the error message is returned immediately in the same HTTP connection; otherwise, the error message is delivered in an asynchronous connection to the address specified by the error URL.

entry.name: ebms_async_ack_delivered
entry.text: Successfully delivered acknowledgment asynchronously
entry.description: The acknowledgment message was sent to the acknowledgment URL for the external partner.

entry.name: ebms_async_error_delivered
entry.text: Successfully delivered message error asynchronously
entry.description: The "MessageError" message was sent to the error URL for the external partner.

entry.name: rtx_cannot_be_recovered
entry.text: Transaction ID %s cannot be recovered.
entry.description: An unexpected shut down occurred. The DataPower Gateway cannot recover the transaction.

entry.name: ebms_receive_ack_with_ambiguous_refid
entry.text: Received acknowledgment with ambiguous RefToMessageId '%s'
entry.description: In manual resend mode, the DataPower Gateway regenerates the message ID for each ebMS outbound transaction. When receiving an asynchronous acknowledgment with an ambiguous "RefToMessageId" element, the DataPower Gateway should be able to use the original message ID to inform users to which transaction the acknowledgment corresponds.

entry.name: ebms_acknowledged_neg
entry.text: Negative acknowledgment for outbound message %s succeeded.
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway received a negative acknowledgment for an outbound ebMS message that it generated.

entry.name: ebms_received_lowlevel_fault
entry.text: Received SOAPFault. Message rejected.
entry.description: Received a SOAP Fault, and the error was not at the ebMS transport level. ebMS version 2.0 leverages the semantics of SOAP Fault for low level SOAP-related errors. For example, a SOAP syntax error generally results in a SOAP Fault error reply. The most likely response is an HTTP 500 and SOAP-related errors.

entry.name: ebms_message_not_acknowledged
entry.text: Message not acknowledged
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway did not receive an acknowledgment or error message after requesting acknowledgment from the receiver. For reliable messaging, use the Attempt Message Retry option to trigger automatic retransmission.

entry.name: ebms_failed_to_retrieve_original_ack_file
entry.text: Failed to retrieve original ebMS ACK file %s.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: filesize_too_large
entry.text: File size: %1$zd (bytes) exceeds tolerated limit %2$zd (bytes)
entry.description: The transaction view can show EDI files when the file size is less than the maximum allowable size for the temporary buffer.

entry.name: config_sftp_sshclient_object_down
entry.text: The SSH Client Connection %1$s for partner %2$s destination %3$s is not provided or is not operational.
entry.description: An SSH Client Connection is required for the SFTP destination, but the specified configuration is not in the "up" operational state or does not exist.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the SSH Client Connection.

entry.name: gateway_archive_task_is_running
entry.text: Archive task is already running
entry.description: Archive task is running. There is no need to schedule another one.

entry.name: message_monitor_setup_fail
entry.text: Archive monitor for B2B gateway '%s' is down
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: archive_num_of_records_exceeds_limit
entry.text: Number of records of this archive task exceed processing limit. Only limited number of records will be processed '%u'
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the thresholds that trigger the archive task. The values might be too large.

entry.name: archive_batch_processing
entry.text: The archive task will be performed in '%d' batches.
entry.description: Because the number of transactions to archive is large, the DataPower Gateway is using batch processing to prevent an out-of-memory situation.

entry.name: archive_monitor_on
entry.text: Archive task has triggered gateway-level archive monitor on.
entry.description: Traffic shaping is turned to ensure archive performance.

entry.name: archive_monitor_off
entry.text: Archive completed. Turn off gateway-level archive monitor.
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway completed the archive task. Turning off the archive monitor.

entry.name: archive_monitor_req_reject
entry.text: Rejected by Archive Monitor %s.
entry.description: The archive monitor rejected the transaction.
entry.suggestion: Check the settings for the archive monitor to determine the cause.

entry.name: sftp_profile_usage_not_sftp
entry.text: The SSH Client Connection %1$s for partner %2$s destination %3$s references an SSH Client Profile that is not configured for SFTP.
entry.description: The SSH Client Connection of the SFTP destination references an SSH Client Profile with an incorrect usage. The profile usage of the SSH Client Connection must be "sftp".
entry.suggestion: Verify that each destination with a URL that starts with "sftp://" uses an SSH Client Profile with a profile usage set to "sftp".

entry.name: invalid_cpa_partner_name
entry.text: Cannot find the specified internal partner in the CPA file.
entry.description: The specified name of the internal partner is incorrect. The DataPower Gateway cannot find the internal partner in the CPA file.
entry.suggestion: Specify the correct name for the internal partner.

entry.name: invalid_encrypt_alg_specified
entry.text: Cannot recognize the encryption algorithm '%s'. The default value will be used.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the encryption algorithm. Valid algorithms are DES-CBC, AES128-CBC, AES192-CBC, and AES256-CBC.

entry.name: invalid_value_for_syncreply_mode
entry.text: Found an invalid value '%1$s' for SyncReply mode. '%2$s' will be used.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: invalid_value_for_permessage
entry.text: Found an invalid value '%1$s' for Message Characteristics. '%2$s' will be used.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: cannot_write_cert_folder
entry.text: Do not have write permission to the cert: directory. The certificate files cannot be saved.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: found_duplicate_cert
entry.text: The certificate file '%1$s' exists. Will not save the file '%2$s' in the CPA file.
entry.description: The certificate exists in the "cert:" directory. The certificate file in the CPA file will not overwrite the certificate file in the "cert:" directory.

entry.name: donot_support_sync_channel
entry.text: Found nested CanSend/CanReceive elements. Synchronous channel is not supported.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: cpa_schema_validation_fail
entry.text: Failed to validate the CPA file.
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway failed to validate the CPA file against the ebXML CPPA schema.
entry.suggestion: See the schema file at "http://www.oasis-open.org/committees/ebxml-cppa/", and ensure that the CPA file is valid.

entry.name: cpa_unsupported_auth_method
entry.text: The authentication method '%s' is not supported.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: cpa_no_signal_service
entry.text: No defined ebMS signal service for CPA entry (CPA ID, Business Collaboration, Internal Partner, External Partner) notation ('%1$s', '%2$s', '%3$s', '%4$s').
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway cannot find a ebMS signal service for certain CPA entry. The transaction might fail without a signal service; for example, the Validation Credential to validate the external partner-signed Acknowledgment has to be defined by the signal service.
entry.suggestion: Add a CPA collaboration, and name the service using "urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-msg:service". This configuration indicates that the collaboration is used for ebMS Signal, including Acknowledgment, Error, Ping, and Status Request.

entry.name: rtx_statusrequest_task_async_pending
entry.text: Status request for message '%s' sent. Awaiting asynchronous response.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: rtx_profile_missing
entry.text: Cannot locate the original B2B partner profile with Business ID (%s).
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the original B2B partner profile is correctly configured and associated with the original B2B gateway.

entry.name: rtx_task_async_timeout_gui
entry.text: No asynchronous response received within 30 seconds.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the system logs for more information.

entry.name: rtx_statusrequest_task_async_timeout
entry.text: No asynchronous response for message '%s' received within 30 seconds.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the system logs for more information.

entry.name: statusresponse_received
entry.text: Received asynchronous Message Status Response with result '%1$s'. The message ID of original Message Status Request is %2$s.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: statusresponse_empty_status
entry.text: Received an asynchronous Message Status Response for message '%s' with empty status result.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: statusresponse_error_status
entry.text: Received an asynchronous Message Status Response for message '%1$s' with illegal status '%2$s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_cpa_matched_collaboration
entry.text: ('%1$s', '%2$s', '%3$s', '%4$s') matched ebXML CPA Entry (CPA ID, Collaboration, From Partner Profile, To Partner Profile).
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_cpa_matched_canreceive_action
entry.text: Matched ebXML CPA Receiver Action: ('%s').
entry.description: In inbound CPA-enforced ebMS messaging, a CPA Action is identified by the value of the "Action" element in the received message. The DataPower Gateway parses the incoming message to validate the action.

entry.name: cpa_collaboration_not_recognized
entry.text: Cannot recognize the requested ebXML CPA entry (CPA ID, Collaboration, From Partner Profile, To Partner Profile): ('%1$s', '%2$s', '%3$s', '%4$s')
entry.description: In inbound or outbound CPA-enforced ebMS transaction, the DataPower Gateway cannot find a matching ebXML CPA entry. Responding with a SOAPFault error.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the CPA entry.

entry.name: cpa_action_not_recognized
entry.text: Cannot recognize the requested ebXML CPA Action ('%s').
entry.description: Cannot recognize the ebXML CPA action based on the configuration of the CPA sender or receiver.
entry.suggestion: Check the value of Action.

entry.name: ebms_cpa_no_replyaction
entry.text: Sender setting for replying %s signal is not set.
entry.description: In CPA-enforced ebXML messaging, this message indicates that when receiving a request (including Message, Ping signal, and Status Request signal), the required Action setting for replying to the response (including Acknowledgment, Error signal, Pong signal, and Status Response signal) is not configured.
entry.suggestion: Check the setting for the default MSH signal and for an Action to ensure they are configured correctly to respond to the signal.

entry.name: async_pong_received
entry.text: Received an asynchronous Pong message. The message ID of the original Ping Request is '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: rtx_ping_task_async_pending
entry.text: Sent the Ping request with message ID '%s'. Awaiting asynchronous response.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: rtx_ping_not_internal_profile
entry.text: The selected partner profile '%s' for Ping action is not an internal profile.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Verify that the partner is an internal partner.

entry.name: rtx_ping_task_async_timeout
entry.text: No asynchronous ebMS Pong message for Ping Message '%s' received within 30 seconds.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the system logs for more information.

entry.name: sqldatasource_not_available
entry.text: SQL data source for the B2B gateway is not available.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the configuration of the B2B gateway to ensure that it defines an SQL data source. If defined, ensure that the operational state is "up".

entry.name: mqfte_metadata_retrieve_failed
entry.text: Failed to retrieve IBM MQFTE metadata.
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway failed to retrieve IBM MQFTE metadata from the remote database.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that IBM MQFTE logger is installed and operational, ensure that the remote database for IBM MQFTE logging is accessible and defined in the configuration of the B2B gateway as the SQL data source, and ensure that the transfer record exists in the remote database.

entry.name: ebms_cpa_inbound_value_unexpected
entry.text: Invalid %1$s: got '%2$s' versus expected '%3$s'
entry.description: The value from the ebXML message is inconsistent with the CPA constraint in the ebXML CPA.
entry.suggestion: Check the settings for the ebXML CPA. Check the validity of the ebMS message header.

entry.name: cpa_unsupported_obj_url
entry.text: Cannot create '%1$s' for either unsupported protocol '%2$s' or for bad URL '%3$s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: cpa_use_incorrect_channel
entry.text: Incorrect delivery channel settings for '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: cpa_bad_transport_receiver
entry.text: Cannot find the transport Receiver in transport '%s'.
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway cannot find the transport receiver from the delivery channel.

entry.name: cpa_bad_status
entry.text: The CPA status is neither 'agreed' nor 'signed'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: cpa_bad_start_end_date
entry.text: The CPA file expires, or the end date is earlier than the start date.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: cpa_is_signed
entry.text: Cannot verify the signature in the CPA. Skipping validation.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: multi_channel_in_action
entry.text: Multiple channels in action '%s' are not supported. The first channel is applied.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: multi_endpoint_in_transport
entry.text: Multiple endpoints in transport '%s' are not supported. The first endpoint is applied.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: rtx_task_success
entry.text: Success

entry.name: rtx_task_unexpected_error
entry.text: Unexpected Error

entry.name: ignore_unsupported_element
entry.text: The element '%s' in the CPA file is not supported. The element is ignored.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: unsupported_cert
entry.text: The certificate '%s' is not supported. The certificate is ignored.
entry.description: Found a certificate with an unsupported format.

entry.name: ebms_cpa_matched_cansend_action
entry.text: Matched Sender Action: '%s'.
entry.description: Identified the "CanSend" action for the outbound CPA-enforced ebMS transaction.

entry.name: config_cpa_missing_action_setting
entry.text: Action binding with ID '%1$s' is configured as %2$s capability but no %3$s setting configured.
entry.description: The setting for the CPA action for the sender or receiver is missing the action binding.
entry.suggestion: Define the action binding.

entry.name: ebms_cannot_sign_ack
entry.text: Missing configurations in %s to sign Acknowledgment.
entry.description: An ebMS sender requests a signed acknowledgment, but the DataPower Gateway cannot generate the signature.
entry.suggestion: Check the required security settings for the sender action, if the B2B gateway is CPA-enabled or in the internal partner profile. For a CPA-enforced B2B gateway, check the setting for the acknowledgment sender; otherwise, check the ebMS settings of the internal partner profile.

entry.name: ebms_packaging_process_failed
entry.text: ebMS packaging process failed: %s
entry.description: A processing error occurred before the attempt to deliver the message to the external partner. The error occurred while packaging the outbound ebMS message or while packaging the acknowledgment signal for replying to an inbound ebMS message. The packaging processor might stop because of failures in a security operation, such as encryption and signing. The details are also returned in the SOAP fault to the client application.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the configurations are defined appropriately.

entry.name: ebms_cpa_ident_info
entry.text: ebMS identification (CPAId, Service, Action): ('%1$s', '%2$s', '%3$s').
entry.description: "CPAId", "Service", and "Action" are required identification information for ebMS routing. In outbound transactions, "CPAId", "Service", and "Action" are packaged in the ebMS message header.
entry.suggestion: Specify the values in the custom processing policy, the destination, or the ebMS settings for the B2B partner profile. Ensure that the values of "CPAId", "Service", and "Action" are all extracted.

entry.name: badname
entry.text: Invalid name of %1$s object '%2$s'.
entry.description: Cannot create a valid configuration. If created, the configuration would be invalid. It would contain illegal characters or its name would be too long.
entry.suggestion: Check whether the given name has a typographic error or is too long. If so, change the name.

entry.name: cpa_has_no_perm_to_obj
entry.text: Has no '%1$s' permission to '%2$s'.
entry.description: The user does not have the appropriate permission to access the configuration.
entry.suggestion: Check your access profile.

entry.name: cpa_overwrite_cert_file
entry.text: The certificate '%s' is overwritten by the one in the CPA file.
entry.description: The CPA Import wizard updated the certificate with the one from the CPA file.

entry.name: rtx_no_service_cpa
entry.text: Cannot match the service collaboration setting for CPA ID %s.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that a CPA collaboration is configured for ebMS signals. The "Service" value of the collaboration is 'urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-msg:service'.

entry.name: rtx_invalid_ping_url
entry.text: Invalid URL for ebMS2 Ping. URL: (%s).
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the destination URL for ebMS2 ping messages is configured correctly.

entry.name: ebms_parsing_nonconformant_ctype
entry.text: Nonconformance of Content-Type header: %s
entry.description: The Content-Type header exists but does not comply with the ebMS specification. The Content-Type MIME header in the message package contains a type attribute that matches the MIME media type of the MIME body part. The MIME body part contains the SOAP message document. In accordance with the SOAP specification, the MIME media type of the SOAP message has the value "text/xml", which indicates that an unexpected error might occur when parsing the body.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the Content-Type header in the incoming message complies with the ebMS specification.

entry.name: rtx_pong_not_signed
entry.text: The pong message from the external partner URL %s is not signed.
entry.description: The CPA configuration expects a signed pong message, but the received pong message is not signed.
entry.suggestion: Check the CPA settings and confirm the agreement with external partners.

entry.name: ebms_illegal_service
entry.text: urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-msg:service is reserved by the ebMS specification and cannot be set for %1$s %2$s.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Specify another value for a business collaboration service.

entry.name: unexpected_async_pong_received
entry.text: Received an unexpected asynchronous Pong message. Cannot find the referenced message '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: unexpected_async_statusresponse_received
entry.text: Received an unexpected asynchronous StatusResponse message. Cannot find the referenced message '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_decryption_failed
entry.text: Failed to decrypt incoming ebMS messages.
entry.description: An error occurred during decryption of the incoming encrypted ebMS message. The DataPower Gateway failed to decrypt the message.

entry.name: dbspace_update_failed
entry.text: Failed to update the B2B persistence store.
entry.description: The size of B2B persistence store is close to its maximum. Perform updates after archiving several records. Failure to update might result in the size of B2B persistence store reaching full capacity.
entry.suggestion: Enlarge the size of B2B persistence store if the maximum size is reached.

entry.name: ebms_no_explicit_validation_cert
entry.text: No explicit validation certificate for signature validation.
entry.description: To verify signatures, either a "KeyInfo element" (in a supported format) of the ebMS message should exist or a default signer certificate should be configured.
entry.suggestion: Configure the default signer certificate in the external partner profile or CPA receiver setting.

entry.name: retransmit_unknown_transactionid
entry.text: Failed to retrieve transaction id for retransmit.
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway failed to retrieve transaction id, and retransmit task will not be scheduled.
entry.suggestion: Check B2B persistence store works normally.

entry.name: edi_parse_error
entry.text: Error happens during EDI parsing with reason '%s'.
entry.description: An error happens during EDI parsing for a specific reason.
entry.suggestion: Check the reason that causes the error.

entry.name: edix12_isa_segment_error
entry.text: Invalid data encountered at byte %1$ld. Delimiter '%2$c' is expected at byte %3$d.
entry.description: Each element of ISA segments should be fixed-length and separated by delimiters.
entry.suggestion: Check the incoming document and ensure it complies with the EDIX12 specification.

entry.name: dbquery_unexpected_parse_error
entry.text: Unexpected error occurred when parsing user query.
entry.description: Unexpected error occurred when parsing query.
entry.suggestion: The function will stop processing the request. Ensure the request is valid. Or report to the administrator.

entry.name: dbquery_condition_layout_error
entry.text: Invalid layout with query-condition: '%1$s'. Must contain %2$s child query-condition nodes.
entry.description: Found invalid layout of input query-condition. A valid non-logical query-condition (for example, with evaluation 'property-equals') must not have any sub-condition; a valid logical condition (for example, logical-and, logical-or, logical-not) must have at least one sub-condition node.
entry.suggestion: Check the query-condition node to make sure the layout is correct with the evaluation operation.

entry.name: dbquery_condition_unsupported_op
entry.text: Invalid evaluation operation ('%s').
entry.description: The input evaluation operation is not defined.
entry.suggestion: Check the documentation or schema to make sure the evaluation operation is in the supported list.

entry.name: dbquery_condition_unsupported_property
entry.text: Invalid property ('%1$s') found in query-condition with evaluation operation ('%2$s').
entry.description: The input property name is not defined.
entry.suggestion: Check the documentation or schema files to make sure the value of property name is in the supported list.

entry.name: dbquery_condition_incompatible_op
entry.text: Property ('%1$s') can not be used with evaluation operation ('%2$s').
entry.description: The evaluation operation is not compatible with certain types of evaluation. Particularly, the fuzzy searching evaluations (for instance, property-starts-with, property-ends-with, or property-contains) are not supported by every type of property.
entry.suggestion: Make sure the evaluation is compatible with the property.

entry.name: dbquery_condition_value_cardinality
entry.text: Evaluation operation ('%1$s') requires %2$s value element(s). (Hint: property name: '%3$s')
entry.description: The number of value given to certain type of evaluation operation is invalid. The number of value(s) required is determined by the evaluation operation. For example, property-equals requires 1 value, and property-between requires 2 value.
entry.suggestion: Make sure the number of value(s) is correct in accordance with the evaluation operation.

entry.name: dbquery_condition_value_enumset_outofrange
entry.text: Input value ('%1$s') is out of scope for property ('%2$s').
entry.description: The input value specified to certain property is out of the scope of the property. For example, the valid value to ASVersion is limited to 'AS1', 'AS2', 'AS3', or 'ebMS2'.
entry.suggestion: Input a supported value or modify the query-condition to retrieve equivalent set of data.

entry.name: dbquery_condition_value_num_format
entry.text: Property ('%1$s') has a value ('%2$s') that is not a valid number format expected.
entry.description: The value of particular property (for example, TransactionSetID) should be in the format of integer number.
entry.suggestion: Make sure the input value is written in the integer number format.

entry.name: dbquery_condition_value_ts_format
entry.text: Property ('%1$s') has a value ('%2$s') that is not a valid timestamp format expected
entry.description: The value of particular property (for example, InputTime) should be in the format of timestamp. The format is YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.
entry.suggestion: Make sure the input value is written in the correct timestamp format.

entry.name: dbquery_constraint_maxrows_toolarge
entry.text: Current requested max-rows %1$d exceeds the maximum number %2$d.
entry.description: The number of maximum rows is limited to 1000 and the specified number is too large. The function will continue to process normally with the system maximum. If more than maximum rows are matched, only system maximum rows will be returned once.
entry.suggestion: Reduce the number of max-rows to 1000 or less. You may separate the request query into multiple ones.

entry.name: dbquery_constraint_startindex_toolarge
entry.text: Requested start-index (%1$d) is more than the total rows matched (%2$d), empty result is returned.
entry.description: When the start-index is larger than the total rows matched, no results are returned. You can either modify the query or use this to inform the last page of results is reached.
entry.suggestion: Verify the results (for example, cross-reference with B2B Viewer) to make sure good query has been entered.

entry.name: dbquery_rbm_novisibility
entry.text: Rejected by visibility filter; no visible column is permitted.
entry.description: No column visibility is permitted; the function will not process the request and return no results.
entry.suggestion: Contact administrator for requesting for appropriate permission.

entry.name: dbquery_sql_construct_error
entry.text: Unexpected error when processing the query.
entry.description: Unexpected error when constructing the query.
entry.suggestion: The function failed to continue to process the request. And this error should be reported to the service personelle.

entry.name: dbquery_sql_exec_error
entry.text: Failed to process the query.
entry.description: Unexpected error when executing the query.
entry.suggestion: The function failed to continue to process the request. And this error should be reported to the service personelle.

entry.name: dbquery_zero_match
entry.text: No transactions matched.
entry.description: The query is successfully processed but no record matched by the input selection criteria.
entry.suggestion: The message is informational.

entry.name: dbquery_sqlinjection
entry.text: SQL Injection: Rejected message from '%1$s' containing possible SQL Injection Attack. Full Message: '%2$s'.
entry.description: The input message contains possible SQL Injection Attack and it is rejected.

entry.name: dbquery_exceed_maxquerydepth
entry.text: The level of query-condition is too deep. The maximum depth is limited to: %d
entry.description: To protect the system from XML recursion depth attack, the depth of query-condition is limited.
entry.suggestion: Reduce the level of query-condition to be equal to or less than the maximum depth. You may want to modify the query logics to select equivalent set of data with fewer levels of query-condition.

entry.name: edi_parse_skip_partner_id
entry.text: Partner ID is set to '%1$s', parsed result '%2$s' will be ignored.
entry.description: Partner ID set by user overrides the parsed result.

entry.name: edi_parse_field_contain_bad_char
entry.text: Parsed field of EDI document contains non ASCII-based character.
entry.description: Non ASCII-based characters will be replaced with \'.\'.

entry.name: dbquery_constraint_outofrange
entry.text: Result constraint '%s' out of range.
entry.description: Requested value to the result constraint field is out of range. The function will not proceed or returns empty results.
entry.suggestion: Modify the input value of the indicated field and query again.

entry.name: dbquery_rbm_noauth_b2btransactionlog
entry.text: Unauthorized to view B2B transaction data.
entry.description: The user has no permission to access B2B transaction data per the DataPower Gateway, or the domain. The function will not process the request and returns empty results.
entry.suggestion: Contact administrator for requesting for appropriate access policies.

entry.name: dbquery_rbm_columnnotvisible
entry.text: Unauthorized to query property '%s'
entry.description: The user has restricted permission to column visibility and the property under the query condition is not visible.
entry.suggestion: Modify the input query of the indicated property and query again. Or contact administrator for requesting for appropriate permission.

entry.name: cpa_entry_notoperational
entry.text: Referenced CPA entry is not operational: (CPA Id, CPA Collaboration, Internal Partner, External Partner) notation ('%1$s', '%2$s', '%3$s', '%4$s').
entry.description: The CPA entry requires that all referenced objects are opstate up to be operational. If any of the CPA, CPA Collaboration, Internal Partner, or External Partner object is not opstate up, or the partner type (ie, internal or external) is not set correctly, the CPA entry cannot be used to match received request.
entry.suggestion: Check indicated CPA entry and ensure all referenced objects are opstate up, and the partner type is correct.

entry.name: invalid_dest_url
entry.text: Invalid destination URL: %s.
entry.description: The URL that is configured for the destination is invalid.
entry.suggestion: Check the length and format of the destination URL.

entry.name: continue_on_message_parse_error
entry.text: Transaction will continue on parsing error since partner IDs are known (From: %1$s, To: %2$s)
entry.description: The transaction will not be rejected on parsing error if partner IDs are known.

entry.name: archive_target_connected
entry.text: Connection to archive target '%s' established
entry.description: Successfully connected to archive target.

entry.name: archive_file_content_not_found
entry.text: File content not found at '%s'
entry.description: Failed to retrieve file content from URL.

entry.name: ebms_pid_type_too_long
entry.text: Ebms-party-id-type attribute exceeds maximum acceptable length. Length: %zd
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: nfs_doc_storage_down
entry.text: The document storage location is not accessible because the NFS static mount object '%s' is down.
entry.description: The document storage location is not accessible.
entry.suggestion: Make sure the NFS static mount is the up operational state. Check the remote NFS server to see if it is running and is accessible from the DataPower Gateway.

entry.name: dbquery_condition_layout_nochild
entry.text: Invalid layout with query-condition: '%s'. Should not contain any child query-condition node.
entry.description: Found invalid layout of input query-condition node. A valid non-logical query-condition node(for example, with evaluation 'property-equals') must not have any sub-condition.
entry.suggestion: Check the query-condition node to ensure that the layout is correct with the evaluation operation.

entry.name: dbquery_condition_layout_atleasttwo
entry.text: Invalid layout with query-condition: '%s'. Should contain at least two child query-condition nodes.
entry.description: Found invalid layout of input query-condition node. A valid logical condition for conjunction (for example, logical-and or logical-or) must have at least one sub-condition node.
entry.suggestion: Check the query-condition node to ensure that the layout is correct with the evaluation operation.

entry.name: dbquery_condition_layout_exactone
entry.text: Invalid layout with query-condition: '%s'. Should contain only one child query-conditions.
entry.description: Found invalid layout of input query-condition node. A valid logical condition for negation (for example, logical-not) must have exactly one sub-condition node.
entry.suggestion: Check the query-condition node to ensure that the layout is correct with the evaluation operation.

entry.name: reprocess_duplicate_message
entry.text: Duplicate message with message ID '%s' will be reprocessed.
entry.description: The DataPower Gateway received a message with the same message ID as a previous message during the transaction. The DataPower Gateway will reprocess it.

entry.name: banned_digest_alg_for_ack
entry.text: The requested digest algorithm '%s' cannot be used for signing the message acknowledgement.
entry.description: The received transaction requested an acknowledgement signed with unsupported or banned digest algorithm.
entry.suggestion: Use a supported digest algorithm in the current cryptographic mode. Alternatively, place the DataPower Gateway into permissive mode.

entry.name: invalid_digest_alg
entry.text: The message digest algorithm '%s' is invalid.
entry.description: The configured digest algorithm for signing an MDN is not supported or not allowed in FIPS mode.
entry.suggestion: Use a supported algorithm in the current crypto mode or put the DataPower Gateway into the Permissive crypto mode.

entry.name: signed_with_invalid_digest_alg
entry.text: The received message is signed with invalid digest algorithm '%s'.
entry.description: The received message is signed with a digest algorithm that is not supported or not allowed in FIPS mode.
entry.suggestion: Work with your external partner to sign their message with a supported algorithm in the current cryptographic mode. Alternatively, place the DataPower Gateway into permissive mode.

entry.name: dno_digest_alg
entry.text: Digest algorithm '%s' is used for the signing of an MDN for the received message.
entry.description: Per therequest from the external partner, an MDN is signed with the specified digest algorithm that is supported by the DataPower Gateway.

entry.name: rtx_invalid_mq_url
entry.text: The IBM MQ URL format '%s' is invalid.
entry.description: The URL for the remote IBM MQ server is invalid or unsupported.

entry.name: purge_from_nfs_doc_storage_failed
entry.text: Cannot purge files from NFS document storage location.
entry.description: An error occurred when files are purged from the NFS document storage location. Some documents might not be purged.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the NFS document storage location is up and running. Then, archive or purge again.

entry.name: wrong_ssl_profile
entry.text: TLS Proxy Profile, %1$s, for partner, %2$s, is not configured for client.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: nfs_doc_storage_notaccessible
entry.text: Operation error in NFS documentation storage location of "%s".
entry.description: A general error occurred when accessing the NFS documentation storage location.
entry.suggestion: Check the status and configuration of the remote NFS server to see if it is accessible from the DataPower Gateway.

entry.name: notify_recep_aware_err
entry.text: An error occurred when sending the reception awareness error notification to URL '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the system logs for additional details.

entry.name: notify_err
entry.text: An error occurred when sending the notification to URL '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the system logs for additional details.

entry.name: notify_dup_detect_err
entry.text: An error occurred when sending the duplicate message detection notification to URL '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.
entry.suggestion: Check the system logs for additional details.

entry.name: rtx_schedule_recep_aware_detail
entry.text: Schedule a new reception awareness task for transaction '%1$s' from partner '%2$s' to partner '%3$s'. The reception awareness error notification is sent to URL %4$s if the reception signal message for transaction '%1$s' is not received after interval '%5$d'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: notification_task
entry.text: Start sending notification to URL %1$s for transaction '%2$s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: rtx_recep_aware_task_done
entry.text: Complete sending reception awareness error notification request for Transaction '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: notification_task_done
entry.text: Complete sending notification request for Transaction '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: notify_dup_detect_task_done
entry.text: Complete sending duplicate message detection notification request for Transaction '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: notification_invalid_url
entry.text: A notification URL is required when the reception awareness error notification is enabled.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_unexpect_signed_message
entry.text: A signed message was received, but the B2B Gateway requires an unsigned message.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_require_signed_receipt
entry.text: An unsigned receipt was received, but the B2B Gateway requires a signed receipt.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_submit_mpc_msg
entry.text: Submitting the message payload that is associated with user name '%s' into MPC '%s'.
entry.description: See message text.

entry.name: ebms_submit_invalid_username_fail
entry.text: The user name that is associated with the submitted message payload is not valid.
